ComicInfo.Summary: Undead detective James Sangster Sr.—the one man standing between Philadelphia and total annihilation—has been KILLED. Now, his son Jimmy Sangster Jr. must find a way to uphold his legacy…but what can one human do against the forces of evil? Will he succeed at keeping this war from ravaging the city and everyone in its path, or will his unborn baby grow up fatherless?
ComicInfo.Tags: Philadelphia,Brittany,Toppy,Werewolves,Abigail Adams,Jupiter Evans,John Adams,Seesaw,There's No Place Like Home,Thomas Jefferson,George Washington,Aelio,Vampires,James Sangster Sr.,Toussaint Louverture
ComicInfo.Title: There's No Place Like Home Part V: My Country, 'Tis of Thee
